CheckBox::Listener Class Reference

#include <CheckBox.h>

Inheritance diagram for CheckBox::Listener:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

The listener interface for check box events.

Note:
The listener concept has been designed for two clients: The main application (e.g. the game) and the skin. Do not create listeners for internal purposes.
Warning:
Listeners are auto-deleting when they are not listening to any component anymore. So you should not hold any references to them.

Definition at line 108 of file CheckBox.h.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

virtual ~Listener (   )  [protected, virtual]
 

Destroys the listener.

Since listeners are managed automatically, you do not need to destroy them by yourself.

virtual VetoMode onStateChanging (  CheckBox *  checkBox,
State  newState
)  [virtual]
 

Called when the check box'es state is about to be changed, either using the user interface or using the setChecked() or setState() methods.

Parameters:

newState The new state the check box should receive.
Returns:
The veto mode, VETO or NO_VETO.
